Text:
This #BlackHistoryMonth, a new analysis from @TheBlackCaucus and @JECDems explains the current economic status of Black Americans. While we should celebrate the progress made, the report shows the challenges that remain. #JECxCBC
 
Read the report below! 
https://t.co/kiO28cQG8S

I’m proud of the work in AZ to help settle Afghan refugees. Thanks to the leadership at places like @Airbnb, we're helping families find safe & secure places to stay.
 
We still have so much work ahead of us, but this is a great example of what’s possible when we work together. https://t.co/qFoctQBGFR

The Child Tax Credit was working. Now, child poverty has shot back up 41% since it expired.

Bring back the #ChildTaxCredit.

I will do all I can to continue engaging my colleagues in Congress, counterparts in the White House, partners in Ukraine, and allies in NATO to ensure the Kremlin immediately regrets its reckless and despicable actions. (8/8)
It is my sacred commitment to stand up for democracy and against oppression, and I will never back down from that. (7/8)

Additionally, we must continue arming Ukraine with the weapons to defend themselves, support our NATO allies, and help neighboring countries manage the potential flow of refugees across their borders. (6/8)
I strongly support the President’s announcement of these sanctions and his plan to bolster U.S. troop presence in NATO countries, including the Baltic states. (5/8)
Putin must experience swift and serious consequences for his actions including crippling sanctions against Russia, its banks, and its leaders—and @POTUS's actions today will do just that. (4/8)
It’s up to the U.S. and all those who believe in democracy to support our Ukrainian partners and surrounding NATO allies. (3/8)

Now, with an autocratic leader determined to chase his nostalgic memories of the USSR’s past, Russia’s actions will change European security in the most significant way since the end of World War II. (2/8)
Russia’s second invasion of Ukraine should enrage supporters of democracy all over the world. When the Soviet Union collapsed, Ukraine sought to forge its own path: a path toward democracy. (1/8)

It was a pleasure to join @SecDebHaaland and @stephenroelewis to announce the $1.7 Billion from President Biden’s Bipartisan Infrastructure Law that will go to Tribes like @GRIC_Official to fulfill water rights settlements this year! https://t.co/Yyc8cXzhux

I’ve long spoken out against Nord Stream 2. We can’t give Russia any leverage.
https://t.co/t41J9Wxo4N

I'm pleased at @POTUS's swift response and I welcome the actions Germany took to halt Nord Stream 2. The world must stand up to Putin's aggression, and ending Nord Stream 2 is just the beginning of the global response if he furthers invades Ukraine. https://t.co/Y24FwjS7se

As the Munich Security Conference wraps up, I am incredibly confident in the unity of our allies and partners. 

We face immense threats and challenges, but we will meet them together.

The last 12 months has been the largest drop of the unemployment rate on record.

Democrats have delivered on bringing our country out of the darkest days of the pandemic. When the House reconvenes, we will deliver on lowering costs and #BuildBackBetter.
Happy Birthday @RepRaulGrijalva! https://t.co/CHN74R83nN

Today I arrived in Germany for the Munich Security Conference. 

As a member of @HASCDemocrats, I’m proud to join my congressional colleagues and @SpeakerPelosi to make clear the U.S’s commitment to our allies & partners, as well as our resolve in the face of Russian aggression.

There is no Planet B.

No matter what form the legislation takes, we must take transformative action to address climate change.

.@HouseDemocrats are at hard at work on legislation like #AmericaCOMPETES and #BuildBackBetter to lower costs for all Americans.

What is the Republican plan to continue growing the economy?

Republican attacks on reproductive freedom are ramping up everywhere, including AZ.

We must protect fundamental reproductive freedoms & abortion access. https://t.co/LlT53LoGnw

This is heartbreaking. We need to keep AZ moving in the same direction as the rest of the country when it comes to veteran homelessness.

I'm glad funds from the American Rescue Plan are going towards helping these vets, and I'll keep fighting in DC to address this crisis. https://t.co/rOEeUUjjmI

The cost of child care has exploded in the last 30 years.

Too many parents have gone into debt just to afford this important service. We must #BuildBackBetter by investing in child care & pre-k.

AZ GOP officials were deeply involved in trying to overturn the will of Arizonans in 2020. Their entertainment of deranged falsehoods about our elections should alarm every Arizonan and every American.

Thank you to the @January6thCmte for continuing to follow the facts. https://t.co/d1QVF9kjLP

.@HouseDemocrats & @POTUS are working everyday to address inflation. We’ve already created 7 million jobs—we will lower costs.

The GOP? They're too busy banning books & bringing back voter suppression laws to care.

.@POTUS is right. We cannot give up on diplomacy, but diplomacy must be paired with deterrence. Russia only understands strength—Moscow needs to understand their actions will have dire consequences. https://t.co/FhDYU8ufob

Internet access is more important than ever. That’s why the #BipartisanInfrastructureLaw includes $14.2 billion to help families struggling to pay for their internet. 

See if you’re eligible!
https://t.co/Wa2GRHfgzY

Four years ago, a gunman took from us 17 innocent lives in Parkland, Florida.

Today, gun violence persists. We must honor their memories and pass commonsense gun safety legislation to end gun violence and prevent these tragedies.

Affordable housing is how we can reduce the racial wealth gap and help families build generational wealth.

We need to #PassBuildBackBetter with $150 billion in fair and affordable housing investments.

Not everyone can buy an EV. That’s why we need affordable EVs & public transportation that are clean, sustainable, & accessible to underserved communities.

That's where the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law comes in—the largest federal investment in sustainable transit.

Some members of Congress are willing to sabotage our health, our economy and our democracy to get back in power.

I still believe in our country. @HouseDemocrats will continue the work to address the needs of American families and deliver #ForThePeople.

We have to keep working to keep wages up and prices down. 

That’s why @HouseDemocrats have plans to fix supply chains and #BuildBackBetter.

ICYMI: This week I proudly announced $11+ million for AZ to build electric vehicle chargers!

Read more here:
https://t.co/iAaVjXAQQ9

Baseless claims of election fraud have the potential to destroy our democracy. We cannot allow our election laws to be rewritten on the basis of conspiracy theories.

Arizona needs Congress to deliver voting rights legislation now. https://t.co/0dSZOsJVl8

My office is closely monitoring the overnight shooting of Phoenix police officers and a civilian. I’m heartbroken by this senseless violence in our district. Those injured and their families are all in my thoughts. I wish them a speedy and successful recovery. https://t.co/j18msfSiV8

#ElectrifyingAmerica will help us combat the growing climate crisis and create good-paying jobs. Thanks to the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law, Arizona will receive more than $11 million this year to invest in EV charging. This is just the start of our work to #ActOnClimate. https://t.co/1KqEzZX7FR

The criminality of the Trump administration was so pervasive even the National Archives is now involved. @TheJusticeDept must quickly investigate if there is any new potential misconduct or criminal violations surrounding the former president's record keeping. https://t.co/kf8qVpdOmw

A comprehensive approach to lowering costs means strengthening our supply chains & bringing manufacturing jobs back to the U.S. — a step the House just took through the COMPETES Act.

We'll keep fighting for Build Back Better & the pocketbooks of American families.

With state-sanctioned hate and violence against LGBTQI+ on the rise globally, I was proud to vote today for HR 3485, the #GlobalRespectAct. 

The United States must stand against human rights abuses and be steadfast in its support of the LGBTQI+ community at home and abroad.

La evidencia es clara: las redes sociales están permitiendo que florezca la desinformación en español.

Las empresas de tecnología tienen que responder a cómo van a combatir la desinformación. Sigo trabajando con @HispanicCaucus para exigir sus respuestas.
https://t.co/r2Cka7EARc

📣 You can still claim #ChildTaxCredit benefits. Just make sure to file your federal taxes by April 18th! Thanks to the @WhiteHouse and @HouseDemocrats, the #CTC has cut child poverty by roughly 30%. Don't wait to file!

Learn more: https://t.co/VVNl5J4P2A https://t.co/xPb1chXYvE

Today, I voted for bipartisan reform to the U.S Postal Service that secures the financial stability of the USPS while also increasing accountability & transparency in its delivery performance. 

Proud to support it & I'll keep monitoring the health of this critical agency.

There was no "legitimate political discourse" occurring on Jan 6. What occurred was a mob, incited by the Big Lie, who attacked our democracy.

Trump and his enablers may never accept reality. @January6thCmte will hold them accountable nonetheless.

Competing globally means building in America.

Whether it's through the #AmericaCOMPETES Act, the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law, or the American Rescue Plan, I'm glad to work with @POTUS to support working families.

SCOTUS' decision to chip away the Voting Rights Act is exactly the type of move that will reverberate all across our country. 
 
Whether it's Alabama, Arizona, or Georgia, the democratic power of Black and Brown voters is under attack. End the filibuster. Pass voting rights. https://t.co/pSFli8QHWy

The #AmericaCOMPETES Act will:

✅Keep the U.S. globally competitive
✅Build #STEM opportunities
✅Fund research & innovation
✅Fight climate change
✅Grow our chip manufacturing capabilities

Let's send it to the President's desk.

Today, the House will vote to eliminate forced arbitration in harassment and assault cases. 
 
All victims deserve the right to their day in court. I will vote to #EndForcedArbitration and ensure the justice system isn’t rigged to protect corporations and abusers.

Secretary Becerra has always been a work horse, not a show horse. Respected Latino leaders like him are a key part of this Administration’s success, and I’m proud of the work he’s done at @HHS. https://t.co/2zv6GYsYz8

I was proud this week to introduce the Restore Veterans’ Compensation Act. We must ensure our veterans receive all the benefits they’re rightfully owed. 
https://t.co/5GRhcvqn6y.

Thanks to everyone for embracing the chilly day and coming out to our Encanto Park town hall! It was great to hear your thoughts and concerns. We’ll see you soon at the next one! https://t.co/mvkuMDBsem

More than 467,000 new jobs were created in January. That’s more than 6.6 million jobs since @POTUS took office. Wages are up, jobs are up, the economy is up.

Democrats deliver for the American people.

With the #AmericaCOMPETES Act, we will turbocharge domestic investment in computer chips, advance American manufacturing at home, strengthen global supply chains and ensure our country remains globally competitive.

I was incredibly proud to support this legislation.

152 years ago today, the 15th Amendment was ratified, granting Black men the right to vote. Unfortunately, we still see barriers to voting in states across our country. 

We must secure voting rights and stop the suppressive efforts that disproportionately affect voters of color.
This includes how we can limit the civilian casualties of our special forces operations and increase accountability while continuing to carry out the critical missions of the US military.
As we learn more details of the operation, I look forward to providing vital oversight in my capacity as Chair of the @HASCDemocrats Intelligence and Special Operations subcommittee.
Thanks to the planning and work of US special forces and the intelligence community, the operation limited civilian casualties and resulted in the safe return of all our troops.
The Biden Administration’s successful raid and elimination of ISIS leader Abu Ibrahim al-Hashimi al-Qurayshi is a clear victory that protects Americans at home and abroad. https://t.co/vWuIj5UMO9

Be there.

RSVP⬇️
https://t.co/SH8VbhDvlH https://t.co/LeTtypkPOU

Michael Flynn is a traitor to our country and a disgrace to the uniform he once served in. I have said it before but he should be held accountable for efforts to undermine our democracy. Now he's out there acting as Putin's stooge... https://t.co/dwSRZhKGhG

ICYMI: Speaking with @CrisLeeMaza of @NationalJournal, I laid out how I see the tensions between Ukraine and Russia and how the US can continue to support our partners in Ukraine. 
https://t.co/ihkpRcu8lD

The federal government shouldn't be able to recoup separation pay when a veteran receives VA benefits. 

That’s why I introduced the Restore Veterans’ Compensation Act with @RepGusBilirakis & @RepDeSaulnier. Our veterans deserve more benefits, not less. 
https://t.co/CsuqvT0eDu

As we celebrate the first day of Black History Month, more than a dozen #HBCUs have been targeted with bomb threats. The movement to attack Black institutions and erase history will fail. 

Those responsible must be condemned and prosecuted.
https://t.co/QnpblgRwDz

Wishing all those welcoming the Lunar New Year in Arizona and around the world a happy and healthy #YearOfTheTiger.

May it be a time of prosperity and happiness for you and your families!

Black history is a core part of the foundation upon which America is built. It's a story of resiliency, courage, innovation, & excellence.

This #BlackHistoryMonth, let’s remember the past but also fight for a future free from systemic racism & injustice. https://t.co/3voEDLUh32
Read more: https://t.co/kNimt6I6aC

Even one roadway death is too many. For years, I've fought for legislation that would help Phoenix address our crisis of roadway fatalities.

Through the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law, a new approach to roadway safety is here. https://t.co/TazBMh0jzb

Only 18% of Native Americans in AZ outside Maricopa and Pima County have traditional addresses, while many rural Navajo Nation residents live more than 2 hours away from a voting precinct.

No matter where Arizonans live–urban or rural–there should be easy access to vote. https://t.co/rSNRD4CjBg

82 years ago today, the first #SocialSecurity check was issued, ushering in a new meaning for the American Dream where seniors could retire in dignity. 

I will always support this foundational program and oppose all efforts to strip away at this benefit.

There’s still time to register for our Public Service Loan Forgiveness webinar!

If you’re a federal, state, local, or tribal government employee, or you work for a not-for-profit organization, learn how you can get assistance with your student loans.

https://t.co/9cCdfMnU5A

🗣️📣Próximo Foro Comunitario

Acompáñame la proxima semana, 5 de Febrero, para un foro comunitario en persona en el parque Encanto! 

Registrate aqui⬇️⬇️
https://t.co/qq74uiRbaL

🗣️📣UPCOMING TOWN HALL

Join me next week, Saturday, February 5, for an in-person, outdoor town hall at Encanto Park!

RSVP here ⬇️⬇️
https://t.co/X7JV5a466d

REMINDER: I’m holding a webinar on the Public Service Loan Forgiveness program. If you’re a public servant–a teacher, nonprofit employee, government worker–learn how you can potentially save thousands on your student loans!

RSVP link below!
https://t.co/9cCdfMnU5A

Climate change means extreme heat. Extreme heat means more deaths, less economic growth, and crumbling infrastructure. The @CorpCommAZ needs to get it together and reverse this misguided decision. 
https://t.co/OfQtBU6fjE

$14.2 billion. That’s the amount the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law includes to help families struggling to pay their internet bills. 
 
24% of Arizonans are eligible for the benefit. See if you qualify for a discount!
https://t.co/Wa2GRHfgzY

On this #HolocaustRemembranceDay, let us honor the more than 6 million lives lost and recommit ourselves to stand against antisemitism and hatred of all kinds. 

With violence against Jews on the rise, we must remember the lessons of history and say #NeverAgain.

Handing Europe over to Vladimir Putin’s ambitions is not an option. We cannot live in a world where autocrats run roughshod over sovereign democracies. 

The U.S must continue supporting Ukraine—now and in the future. https://t.co/pmsRyBoH1n

¡Ya tenemos la fecha, hora y lugar confirmado para nuestro foro comunitario! Haz clic en el enlace de abajo para registrarte, ¡Esperamos verte allí!

⬇️⬇️⬇️
https://t.co/nRrjwKTb4v https://t.co/SrH9P8GLgL

UPDATE: We now have a confirmed date, time, and place for our town hall! Click the link below to register, hope to see you there!

⬇️⬇️⬇️
https://t.co/FIZ8DxMx5Q https://t.co/ZcaRmjA2Ni

In 2021, 3 new voter suppression laws went on the books in AZ, including policies that destroy the permanent early voter list, allow legitimate votes to be thrown out & purge voter rolls.

In 2022, Rs have introduced even more. There is no sitting out the fight on voting rights.

For public servants, the Public Service Loan Forgiveness Program is a way to potentially save thousands of dollars. Join me for a webinar on the program’s transformational changes!

RSVP ⬇️⬇️
https://t.co/9cCdfMnU5A

Tongass Nat’l Forest is home to Alaska Native Tribes, it's an essential tool to fight climate change & it’s the lifeblood of the Southeast Alaskan economy. I'm proud to lead this letter asking USDA to reinstate Roadless Rule protections for the Tongass.
https://t.co/axybEmeEsT

Russia is mistaken if it believes the U.S will stand by while it further invades Ukraine and threatens democracy. I agree with @POTUS's strong actions to deter Russia and believe the U.S. & our allies must continue to do more to support Ukraine. 
https://t.co/TzQ6E4Dnyg

210 million Americans fully vaccinated.
96% of schools open.
6.4 million jobs created.
3.9% unemployment.
5 million Americans gained health insurance.

We're far from finished.

The American people need the Build Back Better agenda. It represents a comprehensive approach that delivers for all communities and on so many concerns, from economic anxiety to climate change. 

We cannot give up on this bill.
Mark your calendars! ⬇️⬇️ https://t.co/Cg7zpDtYwD

Today is the 49th anniversary of Roe v. Wade. For 49 years, Roe has protected the legal right to abortion.

If it were to be overturned, laws in AZ would immediately make abortion illegal. On this anniversary, we must recommit ourselves to stand up for reproductive freedom.

The Child Tax Credit cuts child poverty by HALF. Because the Republicans in the Senate don't support this TAX CUT, child poverty is expected to shoot back up 17% when it expires this month. 

American families need action now.

The GOP dismantled the filibuster in order to pack the Supreme Court with conservative fundamentalists and turn the clock on reproductive freedom back to 1950. 

Opposing filibuster reform isn’t about principle for them. We need voting rights.
Guarde la fecha — voy a organizar un foro comunitario (en persona) el sábado, 5 de febrero. ¡Espero verlo allí! https://t.co/pnW1DnxwCC
Save the date — I will be holding an (in person!) town hall on Saturday, Feb 5. Hope to see you there! https://t.co/Nx4HlaXGjJ

Below find my full statement on this one-year anniversary and the key initiatives I'm proud to have helped move forward!

📰⬇️
https://t.co/UwZrN4BS19

Despite the progress made over the past year, there is still much to be done to fulfill our promises to American families. @POTUS, @VP & @HouseDemocrats have not given up the fight on voting rights, climate change, economic opportunity, and so much more. 

We're not finished yet!

On the environment, the Biden-Harris administration announced their 30x30 plan to conserve our lands and waters by 2030 & have proposed the largest ever investment in our climate. I was proud to join President Biden last year when he restored Bears Ears National Monument.

This unprecedented economic recovery was furthered by the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law’s once-in-a-generation investments in transportation, water, and broadband infrastructure. Arizona alone received $7.3 billion for improving our state’s physical infrastructure.

Congressional Democrats & the @WhiteHouse  worked together to swiftly pass the American Rescue Plan, delivering direct relief to Americans who needed it most, cutting unemployment, and implementing an expanded Child Tax Credit for working families.

When President Biden and Vice President Harris took office, only 2 million Americans were fully vaccinated. Today, 210 million Americans are vaccinated & protected against the worst outcomes of COVID-19.

It’s been one year since President Biden and Vice President Harris were inaugurated, and we’ve come a long way as a country since then. Let’s talk about some of our accomplishments from the past year. A thread:

Thanks to @VetAffairsDems Chair @RepMarkTakano and @RepRaulRuizMD for their leadership, as well as @jonstewart and the veterans service organizations who participated in this important roundtable.
https://t.co/LRzNGwrIdS

When I went to Iraq, the military told us we'd get taken care of when we returned. Now I watch as my fellow veterans suffer from their exposures to burn pits. We can afford to take care of our veterans - IF we make it a priority. https://t.co/CnURVBgdtC

The Senate’s failure to protect voting rights tonight is nothing short of dangerous to our democracy. There are no excuses. The Senate must do whatever it takes to pass the Freedom to Vote Act and the John R. Lewis Voting Rights Advancement Act of 2021. The filibuster has to go. https://t.co/ELwjnkMRYQ

We’re witnessing a slow-moving coup across the country as state legislatures work to suppress the votes of millions.

We cannot let them succeed. We must pass voting rights in the Senate. Our democracy depends on it.

https://t.co/mGrxPEaJy1

With voting rights under attack, I applaud @SenMarkKelly for standing up against voter suppression. This is what leadership looks like.
https://t.co/M4grQvWohD

.@SecBlinken is exactly right. I saw firsthand the Ukrainian people's commitment to a peaceful resolution when I traveled to Kyiv. America will continue to stand with our partners in Ukraine. https://t.co/21TX9UZlIw

Big news! Every home in the U.S. is eligible for FREE at-home COVID-19 tests from @USPS. 

Order your tests at: https://t.co/wBCQHnycSI

MLK stood up for the freedom of Black Americans, including the sacred right to vote. 

His commitment to do what is right inspired generations and helped bring millions fair access to the ballot.

Today, we honor his life and legacy and continue fighting to secure his vision. https://t.co/Ap1ki95SFF

Today we face the most dangerous assault on the vote since Jim Crow. Last year, a record number of voter suppression bills were introduced nationwide– including 3 harmful laws enacted in AZ.

Ahead of MLK day, I urge all Americans not to take this lightly. Democracy is at stake.

Today, I stood with @OfficialMLK3, @RepMondaire
& so many more to demand action on voting rights. Our democracy can't wait any longer. 

End the filibuster and guarantee the vote for all! #DeliverForVotingRights https://t.co/C5MxL2On6B

Today, American families would have received the next round of #ChildTaxCredit payments — if only the Senate had stood up and passed #BuildBackBetter. 

I voted again and again for this incredible program, but now it's on the Senate to deliver for our families.
Proud to join the King family and so many others in Phoenix today as we take a stand for voting rights. The moment is now. https://t.co/GxvfhmJqRy

The filibuster isn't a tool to encourage sophisticated debate, it's a tool to kill legislation that the vast majority of Americans support. Now, it’s a tool being used to kill voting rights.

If it's democracy or the filibuster, I’ll take democracy.

Thanks to the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law, $225 million is coming to Arizona to repair & upgrade 132 bridges in poor condition. That’s just one part of what this bill will do for AZ.

It’s time to modernize our infrastructure & get our communities back to work at the same time.

Throughout this pandemic, @dougducey has misused COVID-19 relief funds to further his own partisan agenda rather than help AZ families in need. I applaud @USTreasury for holding him accountable and urge our governor to finally put AZ families, students, and public health first. https://t.co/rRVNeIfxDN

Today, AZ surpassed 25,000 COVID deaths. Hospitals are overwhelmed, & schools are struggling under @dougducey's anti-science & anti-education policies.

Arizonans don't need election lies, or a trumped up border crisis. We need our governor to step up and save lives.
Democracy is under attack, and Congress must respond. https://t.co/0gLtja6srL
I'm headed to the House floor right now to speak on voting rights. This is a moment of incredible consequence for our country.

Today, I voted with my colleagues to quickly send the Freedom to Vote Act and the John Lewis Voting Rights Advancement Act to the Senate.
 
Voting rights are under attack and Congress has the power to respond. Now, the Senate must abolish the filibuster and pass these bills.

Record inflation is affecting many countries, but thanks to Democrats’ strong action, we're beginning to see progress at home, including wage increases outstripping inflation in December.

We must address rising costs, & Democrats are working to deliver solutions, not complaints.

This is an unacceptable statistic. Guns do not belong in our neighborhoods & schools.
 
We cannot allow ourselves to become numb to the tragedies caused by gun violence. We must take action. https://t.co/ngLBbN2iC4

Senator Reid cared deeply about our nation's public lands and parks. He believed, as I do, that our country's beauty is part of its greatness, and must he protected. 

I was lucky to know him, and our country was lucky to have him. His presence will be greatly missed in DC. https://t.co/fRFMrFvizC

I'm incredibly proud that a bill I introduced last year, the Alexander Lofgren Veterans in Parks (#VIPAct) has become law, giving veterans and Gold Star families free access to our national parks. Glad to deliver on this small token of appreciation. 
https://t.co/HvHJZbVbis

I agree with @POTUS: the only way to ensure our democracy endures is for the Senate to pass the Freedom to Vote Act and the John Lewis Voting Rights Advancement Act.

Democrats stand for democracy. https://t.co/pw09KPGrRu

The divide between Democrats and Republicans on voting rights is simple: 

Democrats want to serve democracy.

Republicans want to serve their electoral interests. 

End the filibuster. Secure voting rights for all Americans.

When I was in Ukraine I witnessed a country ready and willing to defend itself against Russian aggression. The United States will always stand with our partners defending freedom and democracy. https://t.co/yUnoyqt54m

We still have a chance to #BuildBackBetter with an economy that values sustainability.

Climate change is a massive problem, but I'm not a defeatist. Let's get something done. https://t.co/X1azKf6hQm

We are not doing enough to combat climate change. The climate provisions of #BuildBackBetter are desperately needed if we are going to avoid climate disaster. 
 
However it needs to happen, we must get it done.

There is no such thing as democracy without free and fair elections.
 
Abolish the filibuster and send the Freedom to Vote Act and John Lewis Voting Rights Advancement Act to @POTUS’s desk this month.

11 years ago today, a disturbed individual killed 6 people in Tucson and injured 15 more. The victims and survivors of that despicable attack are in my prayers, and I'm thankful everyday we have @GabbyGiffords with us to lead the fight to end gun violence.

2020: Worst year for the job market since 1939.
 
2021: Historic job growth with unemployment at 3.9%
 
The numbers don't lie.🤷‍♂️

The day after the anniversary of January 6th, I’m still most shocked by the deflection & outright denial by some in Congress.

Only one sitting Republican representative attended the moment of silence for law enforcement yesterday—it's just sad. We are better than this.

As the son of immigrants, words can't express how much I love my country. In the Marines, I accepted the possibility of dying for my country. And in Congress, on Jan. 6 I was not going to sit idle while they attacked our country. We must push forward to protect our democracy. https://t.co/Lfg271Nb3Q

As a Marine Corps veteran, I never imagined having to use my training to protect myself and my colleagues on the House floor. I was prepared to do so, and I am thankful to the Capitol Police for giving everything they had to protect the members and staff in the Capitol that day.

Ensuring we keep our democracy means passing election reform.

This means abolishing the filibuster and passing the Freedom to Vote Act and the John Lewis Voting Rights Advancement Act. To do so is not a partisan or political issue - it is the bare minimum we must do.

The violent insurrection was one of the darkest days in the history of American democracy.

We cannot minimize, forget, and whitewash the attack.

Mi oficina está en contacto con nuestros hospitales para asegurar que el gobierno federal está proporcionando el apoyo que necesitan. Mientras tanto, por favor lleve una máscara, vacúnese, y reciba una dosis de refuerzo. (2 / 2)
Cuando el número de casos aumenta rápidamente, puede significar mas tragedia cuando los hospitales están abrumados. (1 / 2) https://t.co/SLfUBhGaJb

Skyrocketing case numbers means more tragedy as hospitals become overwhelmed.
 
My office is in touch with our hospitals to make sure the federal government is providing them the support they need. In the meantime, please, please wear a mask, get vaccinated & get boosted. https://t.co/SLfUBhGaJb

We are witnessing a slow-moving coup in our state legislatures, Boards of Elections, & Secretary of State offices.
 
These are politicians who rejected democracy trying to be the ones counting the votes.
 
We need voting rights legislation and election reform, and we need it now.
It's a new year. Congress is ready to get to work and #BuildBackBetter.

Republicans are determined to rig our elections systems to make it harder for Americans to vote. @RepMondaire and I introduced legislation to stop this voter suppression, but it's stuck in the Senate. Let's do what's right to get it passed. https://t.co/3VCysHS8Mn

The Trump Administration planned to cut down a 500-year-old tree in Tongass National Forest. This one tree holds up to 12 metric tons of carbon, which helps protect Earth from climate change. I’m proud to work with @POTUS to save it.
https://t.co/6zOZ5F3yKz
Happy New Year! I hope today allows everyone the time to reflect on the past year and look ahead at what’s to come. I’m feeling good about 2022—a lot left to do this Congress and the work starts now!

¡Felíz año nuevo! Espero que hoy les permita a todos el tiempo para reflexionar sobre el último año y mirar hacia delante a lo que viene. ¡Tengo un buen presentimiento de 2022 — mucho falta por hacer este Congreso y el trabajo empieza ahora!
